title: Tondemo Senshi Muteking
synopsis: Twelve-year-old Linn Youki loyally supported his father when the world laughed at the scientist for saying that Earth was about to be invaded from outer space. But Linn did not expect to become personally involved--until he met Takoro, the strange young "deputy sheriff" from another world who was on the trail of notorious space criminals.
staff: [['Yuyama, Kunihiko', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamazaki, Kazuo', ['Episode Director']], ['Sadamitsu, Shinya', ['Episode Director']], ['Ueda, Hidehito', ['Episode Director']]]
